 2023-12402023-12-15DND
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of JILL SCOTT of Kingston, Ontario, to be a special adviser to the Minister of National Defence, to serve as Principal of the Royal Military College of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of five years, effective March 4, 2024.
